title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, Supervisory Policies and Procedures, Mortgage Banks, Supervisory Procedure 101 - Application for a License as a Mortgage Banker
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, Supervisory Policies and Procedures, Mortgage Banks, Supervisory Procedure 101 - Application for a License as a Mortgage Banker

State Regulations
§ 101.1 - General information, version 6
§ 101.2 - Application forms and assistance, version 6
§ 101.3 - Definitions, version 3
§ 101.4 - Information and documents required to be submitted, version 3

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, Supervisory Policies and Procedures, Mortgage Banks, Supervisory Procedure 101

Statutory authority: Banking Law, § 12, art. 12-D, §
590

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
